name: Precipice Blades
description: You gather in the natural energy of the land around you and manifest all of the power into fearsome blades of stone. Make three ranged attack rolls against any creature(s) in range, dealing 1d10 + MOVE ground damage on each successful hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

effect.name: Excites the audience a lot if used last.
effect.effect: Raises the crowd meter by 2 if successfully performed last in correct contest, raises the crowd meter by 1 if successfully performed last in complementary contest.
